name: Font Preview
description:
This plugin generates live previews for anything you type, right in the plugin window!


Features:

  • Live preview in plugin
  • Save favorite fonts in a separate tab, and they'll still be there when you reopen the plugin
  • Filter & search for fonts so you don't have to scroll the giant list
  • Reactively loads fonts which otherwise would not have been visible inside a plugin, bringing my list of preview-able fonts from ~300 --> ~1200!


Features in development:

  • Filter by font weights
  • Change preview size and letter-spacing


Bugs, questions, or feedback? --> https://twitter.com/GuamHat
